text: Because you know it's a thin line
between flirting and stalking.
No. It is!
Because if a girl think you cute
she would never accuse you of stalking her.
Brad Pitt can be hiding in your bushes
at three o'clock in the morning
and y'all would be like,
"That's so romantic!
Get low, Brad! Get low!
Peek-a-boo!
I see you!
You're so silly!"
I show up at your job with a dozen roses
and a teddy bear and you're like,
"How'd you find out where I work!"
"Well, it would would have been a lot easier
if you gave me your real first name,
Kimberly!
Got me looking for some girl named Lisa
working at the Walmart!
Now her husband trippin'!
And I want the money back
for the flowers I sent to her job.
Now, come on girl, let's make this work."
